author: Reuters Editorial
title: Good relation with Russia are a German interest - Merkel
text:
SOCHI, Russia, May 18 (Reuters) - Germany has a strategic interest in good relations with Russia, Chancellor Angela Merkel said on Friday after talks with President Vladimir Putin, adding that this did not go against the continuation of a firm trans-atlantic friendship.
Merkel also said she stressed the need for the continuation of gas transit via Ukraine even after the completion of the Nord Stream 2 gas pipeline, which will circumvent the country.
Reporting by Joseph Nasr and Thomas Escritt
